On Mon, Dec 19, 2022 at 8:00 AM, Sandor Keresztes <sandor.keresztes@kayako.com> wrote via Mail:

Hello Jack,

 

Kayako Cloud has more functionality and API integration capabilities. Kayako Classic, on the other hand, you can build these type of products directly into the source code, however you require developers for that. Kayako cloud would be the best solution, in your case. It supports, emails, live chat and with API you can also integrate products like WhatsApp. You can start with services like Zapier and Integrately. In terms of Skype, does it have API capabilities? Also, regarding Calls, what system do you use?
